alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 3:34PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bradford, east central Alachua, southwestern St. Johns, northern Putnam and southern Clay Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 333 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Melrose, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hastings, Melrose, George`s Lake, Picolata, Lake Geneva, Florahome, Bostwick, Federal Point, Bardin and Melrose Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Western Clay
